div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 443 Macedonia?, 1970 or earlier Burial: c. 290-280 B.C. (T) Contents: 19+ AR Alexander III: 17 early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 13, Pella 1, Pella? 2, Damascus 1) Lysimachus: 2 lifetime tetradr. (Lamp- sacus 1, Sardes 1) Disposition: dispersed Photos on file in ANS
